Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html#/s:11.name: shouldChangeStateForRadioButton(_:)
Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html#/s:11.abstract: Allows the prevention of state change for a button. State change is defined as going from pressed to unpressed or vis a versa. If the method is not implemented the button will change state.

Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html#/s:11.name: radioButton(_:pressStateChangedTo:)
Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html#/s:11.abstract: When a radio button has changed its pressed state this is called.

Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html.name: RadioButtonDelegate
Protocols/RadioButtonDelegate.html.abstract: Allows fine control of the state of a RadioButton. You can prevent changes of the pressed state of the button and recieve updates when a button has changed it’s state.

Enums/RadioButtonAnimationInterval.html.name: RadioButtonAnimationInterval
Enums/RadioButtonAnimationInterval.html.abstract: Predefined animation times for radio buttons with a customizable time as well.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..name: single
Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..abstract: Only one RadioButton can be selected at any one time.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..name: multiple
Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..abstract: Any number of RadioButtons can be selected at any one time.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.name: keepOnePressed
Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.abstract: When true this will ensure at least one buttton stays pressed in the group, once a button has been pressed in the group.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.name: groupButtons
Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.abstract: All the buttons living in the group

Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.name: radioButtonGroupAnimationInterval
Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html#/s:11Radio.abstract: Controls the group animation interval, when set the group will adher to this interval instead of each individual button animation interval. If set to nil, all buttons will be set to .standard.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..name: SelectionStyle
Classes/RadioButtonGroup/SelectionStyle..abstract: In a RadioButtonGroup you can have only one selected or many selected (including all).

Classes/RadioButton.html#/c:@M@RadioButt.name: borderColor
Classes/RadioButton.html#/c:@M@RadioButt.abstract: The color of the ‘ring’ around the button. Default color is the tintColor.

Classes/RadioButton.html#/c:@M@RadioButt.name: fillColor
Classes/RadioButton.html#/c:@M@RadioButt.abstract: The color of the button fill. Default color is the tintColor.

Classes/RadioButton.html.name: RadioButton
Classes/RadioButton.html.abstract: A simple solution for a simple radio button. This can be used on it’s own or in a RadioButtonGroup.

Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html.name: RadioButtonGroup
Classes/RadioButtonGroup.html.abstract: Groups together RadioButtons to allow management of multiple radio buttons at once.
